name: Goo Dasher
description:
This game is about a slime running from ROBOCHAD

We made this game as a submission for  ScoreSpaceJam #19

Developers: Blue Peanuts , Tancomebine

The sprites, music, and sound effects are all made by us.

Known Issue: The music doesn't loop once it ends.

Click here to go to Blue Peanut's YT channel.
